name: Certificate of Undergraduate Study in Azure Fundamentals

Certificate of Undergraduate Study in Az: Certificate of Undergraduate Study in Azure Fundamentals The Certificate of Undergraduate Study (CUGS) in Azure Fundamentals is designed to offer students the opportunity of a specialized study to provide students with experience in key courses of this discipline at the undergraduate level. This CUGS prepares students to sit for the following certification exams: Microsoft AZ-900

notes: Required Courses: 12 s.h. Students seeking this CUGS are required to successfully complete (grade of D- or better) the four courses in the order listed below:
Total Required Credits for the Program: 12 s.h. Advisor Patrick McKee Robinson Hall 328G 856.256.4805 mckeep82@rowan.edu
